alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 10:59AM EDT until June 29 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Muhlenberg County in south central Kentucky... McLean County in northwestern Kentucky... Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... Central Webster County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 958 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whitesville to near Calhoun to Dixon, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Central City, Graham, Madisonville, Earlington, Powderly, Greenville, Mortons Gap, Weir and Nortonville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 95 and 136. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 65. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 28 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
